overview:
Rhone Group is a mid-market private equity firms specializing in mergers and acquisitions leveraged buyouts, recapitalization and partnerships with particular focus on European and Trans- Atlantic investments. Rhone also offers financial advisory services, strategic alliances, joint partnerships, and business valuation services.

Rhone is an international yet closely held firm, headquartered in New York with additional offices in London and Paris. Rhone was founded in 1995 by billionaire financiers Robert Agostinelli and Steven Langman. The pair have been running and managing Rhone since inception along with their team who many of whom have been working together since the early 80’s at Lazard and Goldman Sachs. Rhone have total assets under management exceeding 7.5 billion and employs over 100 business professionals.
